name: ItemStackHelper
description: A fundamental helper class in JSMacros that represents item stacks in Minecraft, providing access to properties like enchantments, NBT data, and durability.
overview: ItemStackHelper wraps Minecraft's internal ItemStack class and exposes its functionality to JSMacros scripts in a user-friendly way. It can represent any item stack - from simple dirt blocks to complex enchanted diamond swords with custom NBT data.

constructors.description: Creates a new ItemStackHelper instance from an item ID and count.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The registry ID of the item (e.g., 'minecraft:diamond' or 'golden_apple')

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of items in the stack

methods.name: getItemId
methods.description: Returns the item's registry ID (e.g., 'minecraft:diamond_sword').

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the display name of the item.
examples:
const item = Player.getMainHand();
Chat.log(`This is food: ${item.getName()}`);

methods.name: getDefaultName
methods.description: Returns the default item name.

methods.name: getCount
methods.description: Returns the number of items in the stack.

methods.name: getMaxCount
methods.description: Returns the maximum stack size.

methods.name: isEmpty
methods.description: Returns true if the stack is empty.

methods.name: getTags
methods.description: Returns a list of item tags (e.g., ['minecraft:logs', 'minecraft:planks']).

methods.name: isFood
methods.description: Returns true if the item is edible.

methods.name: isTool
methods.description: Returns true if the item is a tool.

methods.name: isWearable
methods.description: Returns true if the item can be worn as armor.

methods.name: getCreativeTab
methods.description: Returns the creative tabs this item appears in.

methods.name: getMaxDurability
methods.description: Returns maximum durability (returns 0 for non-damageable items).
examples:
const sword = Player.getMainHand();
const maxDurability = sword.getMaxDurability();

methods.name: getDurability
methods.description: Returns current remaining durability.
examples:
const sword = Player.getMainHand();
const currentDurability = sword.getDurability();

methods.name: getDamage
methods.description: Returns damage taken.

methods.name: getMaxDamage
methods.description: Returns maximum damage (same as getMaxDurability()).

methods.name: isDamageable
methods.description: Returns true if the item can be damaged.

methods.name: isUnbreakable
methods.description: Returns true if the item has the unbreakable flag.

methods.name: getEnchantments
methods.description: Returns a list of all enchantments on the item.

methods.name: getEnchantment
methods.description: Returns specific enchantment by ID or null if not present.

methods.name: hasEnchantment
methods.description: Returns true if item has specific enchantment by ID.
examples: if (pickaxe.hasEnchantment("minecraft:efficiency")) { ... }

methods.name: hasEnchantment
methods.description: Returns true if item has specific enchantment object.

methods.name: isEnchanted
methods.description: Returns true if item has any enchantments.

methods.name: isEnchantable
methods.description: Returns true if item can be enchanted.

methods.name: getPossibleEnchantments
methods.description: Returns all enchantments that can be applied to this item.

methods.name: getPossibleEnchantmentsFromTable
methods.description: Returns enchantments available from the enchanting table for this item.

methods.name: canBeApplied
methods.description: Returns true if enchantment can be applied to this item.

methods.name: getNBT
methods.description: Returns NBT data as NBTElementHelper or null if no NBT.

methods.name: isNBTEqual
methods.description: Compare NBT data with another ItemStackHelper.

methods.name: isNBTEqual
methods.description: Compare NBT data with a vanilla ItemStack.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Checks full equality (item, components, NBT) with another ItemStackHelper.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Checks full equality (item, components, NBT) with a vanilla ItemStack.

methods.name: isItemEqual
methods.description: Checks item equality including damage with another ItemStackHelper.

methods.name: isItemEqual
methods.description: Checks item equality including damage with a vanilla ItemStack.

methods.name: isItemEqualIgnoreDamage
methods.description: Checks item equality ignoring damage with another ItemStackHelper.

methods.name: isItemEqualIgnoreDamage
methods.description: Checks item equality ignoring damage with a vanilla ItemStack.

methods.name: getAttackDamage
methods.description: Returns the attack damage value of the item.

methods.name: isSuitableFor
methods.description: Returns true if the tool can mine the specified block.

parameters.name: blockHelper
parameters.description: The block to check suitability for

methods.name: isSuitableFor
methods.description: Returns true if the tool can mine the specified block state.

parameters.name: blockStateHelper
parameters.description: The block state to check suitability for

methods.name: getLore
methods.description: Returns a list of lore lines as TextHelper objects.

methods.name: hasDestroyRestrictions
methods.description: Returns true if the item has can_destroy restrictions (Adventure mode).

methods.name: hasPlaceRestrictions
methods.description: Returns true if the item has can_place_on restrictions (Adventure mode).

methods.name: getDestroyRestrictions
methods.description: Returns list of block predicates for destroy restrictions.

methods.name: getPlaceRestrictions
methods.description: Returns list of block predicates for place restrictions.

methods.name: areEnchantmentsHidden
methods.description: Returns true if enchantments are hidden in the item tooltip.

methods.name: areModifiersHidden
methods.description: Returns true if attribute modifiers are hidden.

methods.name: isUnbreakableHidden
methods.description: Returns true if the unbreakable flag is hidden.

methods.name: isCanDestroyHidden
methods.description: Returns true if the can_destroy flag is hidden.

methods.name: isCanPlaceHidden
methods.description: Returns true if the can_place_on flag is hidden.

methods.name: isDyeHidden
methods.description: Returns true if armor dye color is hidden.

methods.name: getRepairCost
methods.description: Returns the repair cost in experience levels.

methods.name: isOnCooldown
methods.description: Returns true if the item is currently on cooldown.

methods.name: getCooldownProgress
methods.description: Returns cooldown progress (0.0 to 1.0).

methods.name: copy
methods.description: Creates a copy of this item stack.
examples:
const item = Player.getMainHand();
const itemCopy = item.copy();

methods.name: getCreative
methods.description: Returns a CreativeItemStackHelper for modification of properties.
examples:
const item = Player.getMainHand();
const creative = item.getCreative();

methods.name: getItem
methods.description: Returns the ItemHelper representing the base item.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns the string representation of the item stack.
examples:
const item = Player.getMainHand();
Chat.log(item.toString());
